solution_line_template: If Each fourth-grader bought {pizzas_per_grader} pizzas, with each pizza having {pieces_per_pizza} pieces, each fourth-grader had a total of {pizzas_per_grader}*{pieces_per_pizza} = <<{pizzas_per_grader}*{pieces_per_pizza}={pieces_per_grader}>>{pieces_per_grader} pieces of pizza in their box.

Ten fourth-graders each bought 20 pizzas, and since the 20 pizzas had {pieces_per_grader} pieces, the total number of pizzas in the students' boxes is {pieces_per_grader}*{num_fourth_graders} = <<{pieces_per_grader}*{num_fourth_graders}={total_pieces}>>{total_pieces} pieces.
